content: You can contact our emergency assistance team, available 24/7, at the number provided in your policy schedule. (Equipo de asistencia de emergencia)
What are my insurance conditions, Rachel?
Esencial revisar condiciones importantes. (Important to review important conditions.)
Okay cool, please explain them to me.

It's important that you comply with the health conditions in the policy wording to ensure your claim or cover is not jeopardized. And if you're traveling to Australia, you must enroll with a local Medicare office if you need medical treatment. Please refer to the policy wording for full details.
Okay, cool. Thanks. Please say that in Spanish.

Es importante cumplir con las condiciones de salud. Para tratamiento médico en Australia, regístrese en una oficina local del Medicare. Revise el archivo de detalles completos. (It is important to comply with health conditions. For medical treatment in Australia, register at a local Medicare office. Review the full details file.)
